channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft Corporation -- Exchange Server
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft Corporation -- Exchange Server

item.title: CVE-2018-0941|2024-08-05T03:44:11.671Z -- microsoft%20corporation -- exchange%20server
item.description: Microsoft Exchange Server 2016 Cumulative Update 7 and Microsoft Exchange Server 2016 Cumulative Update 8 allow an information disclosure vulnerability due to how data is imported, aka "Microsoft Exchange Information Disclosure Vulnerability". This CVE is unique from CVE-2018-0924.

item.title: CVE-2018-0924|2024-08-05T03:44:11.689Z -- microsoft%20corporation -- exchange%20server
item.description: Microsoft Exchange Server 2010 Service Pack 3 Update Rollup 20, Microsoft Exchange Server 2013 Cumulative Update 18, Microsoft Exchange Server 2013 Cumulative Update 19, Microsoft Exchange Server 2013 Service Pack 1, Microsoft Exchange Server 2016 Cumulative Update 7, and Microsoft Exchange Server 2016 Cumulative Update 8 allow an information disclosure vulnerability due to how URL redirects are handled, aka "Microsoft Exchange Information Disclosure Vulnerability". This CVE is unique from CVE-2018-0941.
